32 namespace TiledArray {
33 namespace math {

36 
38 template <std::size_t N>
39 class TransposeUnwind;
40 
41 template <>
42 class TransposeUnwind<0> {
43  public:
44  static constexpr std::size_t offset = TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND - 1;
45 
46  template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args>
47  static TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void gather_trans(
48  Op&& op, Result* MADNESS_RESTRICT const result,
49  const std::size_t arg_stride,
50  const Args* MADNESS_RESTRICT const... args) {
51  // Load arg block
52  Block<Result> result_block;
53  for_each_block(op, result_block, Block<Args>(args)...);
54 
55  // Transpose arg_block
56  result_block.scatter_to(result, TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND);
57  }
58 
59  template <typename Op, typename Result>
60  static TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void block_scatter(
61  Op&& op, Result* const result, const Result* const arg,
62  const std::size_t /*result_stride*/) {
63  for_each_block_ptr(op, result, arg);
64  }
65 
66 }; // class TransposeUnwind<0>
67 
68 template <std::size_t N>
69 class TransposeUnwind : public TransposeUnwind<N - 1> {
70  public:
71  typedef TransposeUnwind<N - 1> TransposeUnwindN1;
72 
73  static constexpr std::size_t offset = TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND - N - 1;
74 
75  template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args>
76  static TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void gather_trans(
77  Op&& op, Result* MADNESS_RESTRICT const result,
78  const std::size_t arg_stride,
79  const Args* MADNESS_RESTRICT const... args) {
80  {
81  // Load arg block
82  Block<Result> result_block;
83  for_each_block(op, result_block, Block<Args>(args)...);
84 
85  // Transpose arg_block
86  result_block.scatter_to(result, TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND);
87  }
88 
89  TransposeUnwindN1::gather_trans(op, result + 1, arg_stride,
90  (args + arg_stride)...);
91  }
92 
93  template <typename Op, typename Result>
94  static TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void block_scatter(
95  Op&& op, Result* const result, const Result* const arg,
96  const std::size_t result_stride) {
97  for_each_block_ptr(op, result, arg);
98  TransposeUnwindN1::block_scatter(op, result + result_stride,
99  arg + TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND,
100  result_stride);
101  }
102 
103 }; // class TransposeUnwind
104 
105 // Convenience typedef
106 typedef TransposeUnwind<TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND - 1> TransposeUnwindN;
107 
108 template <typename InputOp, typename OutputOp, typename Result,
109  typename... Args>
110 TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void transpose_block(InputOp&& input_op,
111  OutputOp&& output_op,
112  const std::size_t result_stride,
113  Result* const result,
114  const std::size_t arg_stride,
115  const Args* const... args) {
116  constexpr std::size_t block_size =
117  TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND * TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND;
118  TILEDARRAY_ALIGNED_STORAGE Result temp[block_size];
119 
120  // Transpose block
121  TransposeUnwindN::gather_trans(input_op, temp, arg_stride, args...);
122 
123  TransposeUnwindN::block_scatter(output_op, result, temp, result_stride);
124 }
125 
126 template <typename InputOp, typename OutputOp, typename Result,
127  typename... Args>
128 TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void transpose_block(
129  InputOp&& input_op, OutputOp&& output_op, const std::size_t m,
130  const std::size_t n, const std::size_t result_stride,
131  Result* MADNESS_RESTRICT const result, const std::size_t arg_stride,
132  const Args* MADNESS_RESTRICT const... args) {
133  TA_ASSERT(m <= TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND);
134  TA_ASSERT(n <= TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND);
135 
136  constexpr std::size_t block_size =
137  TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND * TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND;
138  TILEDARRAY_ALIGNED_STORAGE Result temp[block_size];
139 
140  // Copy and transpose arg data into temp block
141  for (std::size_t i = 0ul; i < m; ++i) {
142  std::size_t offset = i * arg_stride;
143  for (std::size_t j = 0ul, x = i; j < n;
144  ++j, x += TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND, ++offset)
145  input_op(temp[x], args[offset]...);
146  }
147 
148  // Copy the temp block into result
149  for (std::size_t j = 0ul; j < n; ++j) {
150  Result* MADNESS_RESTRICT const result_j = result + (j * result_stride);
151  const Result* MADNESS_RESTRICT const temp_j =
152  temp + (j * TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND);
153  for (std::size_t i = 0ul; i < m; ++i) output_op(result_j + i, temp_j[i]);
154  }
155 }
156 
158 
174 template <typename InputOp, typename OutputOp, typename Result,
175  typename... Args>
176 void transpose(InputOp&& input_op, OutputOp&& output_op, const std::size_t m,
177  const std::size_t n, const std::size_t result_stride,
178  Result* result, const std::size_t arg_stride,
179  const Args* const... args) {
180  // Compute block iteration control variables
181  constexpr std::size_t index_mask = ~std::size_t(TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND - 1ul);
182  const std::size_t mx = m & index_mask; // = m - m % TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND
183  const std::size_t nx = n & index_mask; // = n - n % TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND
184  const std::size_t m_tail = m - mx;
185  const std::size_t n_tail = n - nx;
186  const std::size_t result_block_step = result_stride * TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND;
187  const std::size_t arg_block_step = arg_stride * TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND;
188  const std::size_t arg_end = mx * arg_stride;
189  const Result* result_end = result + (nx * result_stride);
190 
191  const auto wrapper_input_op = [&](Result& res, param_type<Args>... a) {
192  res = input_op(a...);
193  };
194 
195  // Iterate over block rows
196  std::size_t arg_start = 0;
197  for (; arg_start < arg_end;
198  arg_start += arg_block_step, result += TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND) {
199  std::size_t arg_offset = arg_start;
200  Result* result_ij = result;
201  for (; result_ij < result_end;
202  result_ij += result_block_step, arg_offset += TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND)
203  transpose_block(wrapper_input_op, output_op, result_stride, result_ij,
204  arg_stride, (args + arg_offset)...);
205 
206  if (n_tail)
207  transpose_block(wrapper_input_op, output_op, TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND,
208  n_tail, result_stride, result_ij, arg_stride,
209  (args + arg_offset)...);
210  }
211 
212  if (m_tail) {
213  std::size_t arg_offset = arg_start;
214  Result* result_ij = result;
215  for (; result_ij < result_end;
216  result_ij += result_block_step, arg_offset += TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND)
217  transpose_block(wrapper_input_op, output_op, m_tail,
218  TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND, result_stride, result_ij,
219  arg_stride, (args + arg_offset)...);
220 
221  if (n_tail)
222  transpose_block(wrapper_input_op, output_op, m_tail, n_tail,
223  result_stride, result_ij, arg_stride,
224  (args + arg_offset)...);
225  }
226 }
227 
228 } // namespace math
229 } // namespace TiledArray
